Name: PomboTroll
About the game: PomboTroll is an extremely fun 2D game. Fly on the wings of a pigeon and earn points pooping and vomiting on other birds. Challenge other players for a gross battle and be the trollest pigeon of all! Goal: Fly as far as possible, making a higher score as you get everyone dirty in front of you and win the prize of the biggest troll pigeon of all. Single Player: In single player mode, you will be alone with the goal of flying far, scoring high! For this you will have to eliminate your enemies by acquiring 'ammunition' and skills along the way. Versus Mode: In versus mode, two players compete for 'ammunition' and skills to have the highest score and the title of the biggest troll pigeon of all. Control:
